com.mobius.vdrapi
Class ResultOptions

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.ResultOptions
public class ResultOptions
extends Object

An instance of this class represents the format and requirements of the result-set that is returned from a Enhanced Search Topic Item query. This includes:

  • Result grouping options and/or Result columns
  • Whether to include Document References
  • Result Consolidation
  • Search Operation mode
  • Request count
The default ResultOptions behavior simulates the existing search API result-set options, and is as follows:
  • Topics are grouped by SEARCHCRITERIA
  • Document References will be returned
  • Result consolidation is by PAGERANGE
  • Search Operation mode is SEARCH
  • Up to ResultOptions.MAX_RESULTS will be returned
Result Grouping (ResultGrouping class)

ALLGROUPTOPICS -- Requests the return of values for all topics specified as search criteria plus all other topics that belong to the topic groups in which the search criteria topics belong. The return values also include the report, report version and section for the returned matches.

SEARCHCRITERIA -- Requests the return of values for all topics specified as search criteria. The return values also include the report, report version and section for the returned matches. This is the default

NONE -- No result grouping options are selected. Note that if this option is selected, ResultColumns must be defined within the ResultOptions object.

Result Columns (ResultColumns class)

A ResultColumns object represents a collection of ResultColumn objects, which in turn identifies the columns to be returned from an Enhanced Search Topic Item Query. Concrete ResultColumn objects include:

  • TopicResultColumn
  • ReportResultColumn
  • VersionResultColumn
  • SectionResultColumn
Document References

A boolean flag that specifies whether document reference information is to be returned in addition to topic values. The default is TRUE.

Result Consolidation (ResultConsolidation class)

NONE -- No consolidation will be performed on the query results. All query matches will be returned, ordered by ResultColumn sort order specifications (if any).

PAGERANGE -- Consolidates consecutive matching pages into a single search result. This option emulates the existing search API behavior. The existing search API sorts the returned topic items and the report, report version and section info in an ascending sort order. This option must be used in conjunction with explicitly specified ResultColumn Sort orders that match the existing sort specifications for the search. Otherwise, the PAGERANGE consolidation option may not exactly match the result-set returned from the existing search API. This is the default.

Search Operation mode (SearchOperation class)

SEARCH -- Returns all occurrences of each matching topic item value.

BROWSE -- Returns only the first occurrence of each matching topic item value.

Request count

The maximum size of the result-set.

Constructor Detail

ResultOptions

public ResultOptions()
Empty constructor defaults:
  • Topics grouped as defined in the search criteria
  • Document references will be returned
  • No result consolidation
  • standard search operation (return all matching results)
  • Request count is initialized to zero
